q: responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an`` innovator and entrepreneur to the core'' and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed. He would continue to sport the`` co-founder'' title
